data.title: Taipei American School
data.text:
Inquire & Learn More

Get Your Most Important Questions Answered

We are so happy that you are considering the Taipei American School for your child. Whether you are already in Taipei, or still living abroad, please complete the form below and one of our dedicated admissions team members will be in contact with you shortly.

We look forward to learning about your interest in joining TAS and hosting you on campus soon.​​​​
